name: Demonskin Armour
data: It increases the users strength ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users dexterity ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users constitution ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users wisdom ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users intelligence ILLEGALLY.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration ILLEGALLY.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
